title: 5 Ways to Impress Your Church's First-Time Guests | Episode 45
itunes:title: 5 Ways to Impress Your Church's First-Time Guests | Episode 45
description: In this week's episode, Tony interviews Amy about the most common "misses" she sees when churches welcome first-time guests. Whether it's a crowded bulletin or a lengthy message, these issues typically have easy (and inexpensive) solutions.
content:encoded: In this week's episode, Tony interviews Amy about the most common "misses" she sees when churches welcome first-time guests. Whether it's a crowded bulletin or a lengthy message, these issues typically have easy (and inexpensive) solutions.
itunes:subtitle: Here Are a Few Ways to See Your Church with Fresh Eyes
